Method: Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015
Project Description: This project involves strategic and planned burning of savanna areas in the high rainfall zone during the early dry season to reduce the risk of late dry season wild fires.
Project Area(s), where the project is an:
16/SP262570, 6/SP262570, 3875/PH2152, 36/SP215745, 7/SP241132, 21/SP241432, 10/SP261207

This project is in the Cook local government area.
Notes:
12/06/2015 Variation to participant name - to include Corporate Carbon Solutions Pty Ltd as a joint participant.

2/02/2016 Variation of project method - from the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative) (Reduction of Greenhous Gas Emissions through Early Dry Season Savanna Burning - 1.1) Methodology Determination 2013 to the Carbon Credits (Carbon Farming Initiative - Emissions Abatement through Savanna Fire Management) Methodology Determination 2015.
